description: This file defines a Todo class and a Todos container class for managing a list of todo items, including filtering, updating, and event handling.

classes.name: Todos
classes.description: A mutable, observable container for a todo list that supports filtering, event notifications, and URL hash-based filtering.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with specified text, generating a unique id.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Removes a todo item by its id.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates a todo item with new properties.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a todo item by id.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Toggles all todos between completed and active states.

methods.name: clearCompleted
methods.description: Removes all completed todos from the list.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Adds event listener for hashchange to update filter.

methods.name: filtered
methods.description: Returns the list of todos filtered according to current filter.

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Getter and setter for current filter state.
